text: Maria Grazia Marchelli (1 June 1932 - 26 June 2006) was an Italian alpine skier. She competed at the 1952 Winter Olympics and the 1956 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2006 deaths Category:Italian female alpine skiers Category:Olympic alpine skiers of Italy Category:Alpine skiers at the 1952 Winter Olympics Category:Alpine skiers at the 1956 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Genoa
title: Maria Grazia Marchelli
